forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers this morning transitioning to light rain for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
